title: Machine Learning-Based Cardiovascular Disease Prediction Modeling Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, programming (Python), fundamental machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, focusing on integrated education in mathematical modeling and medical data analysis.

learning_goals: Preprocess cardiovascular disease data and mathematically explain feature extraction processes
Implement disease risk classification models by applying supervised/unsupervised learning algorithms
Calculate model performance metrics (accuracy, precision, recall) and interpret their clinical significance

resources: Public Medical Datasets (e.g., Heart Disease UCI)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
